Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300002e>こんな人里はなれたところに、 村があったなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300002E>A place as remote as this is certainly the last place I'd expect to be inhabited.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300002f>わざわざこんなヘンピな所に 住まなくてもいいのにネ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300002F>Why on earth would they build a village out in the middle of nowhere?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000031>俺たちは、 招かれざる客かもしれん。 気をつけて行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000031>Stay sharp. We may not be welcome here.
<voice:33000066>Sorry, but I don't want to talk right now.
<voice:3300006B>You don't need to face this alone.
<voice:3300006D>We'll be waiting for you at the inn.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300006f>もう一度、 お母さんと話をしてみない？ やっと会えたのに、このままじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300006F>Perhaps you should try talking to your mother one more time? You two were finally reunited. To leave things like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000071>あの人は、私を……ハーフの子供を 見たくもないって言ったのよ！ あんただって聞いたでしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000071>That woman, she...she said she didn't even want to look at a Halfblood like me! Or did you somehow not manage to hear that?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000072>でも、様子がおかしかった…… 何か理由があるのかもしれないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000072>But something doesn't seem right. I think there may be an underlying reason for...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000073>理由なんて 聞かなくたって……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000073>I don't give a damn about her reason!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000074>……<Hilda>さんは、 お母さんと話をしたくないの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000074><Hilda>...you really don't want to try talking with her one more time?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000075>あんたに何がわかるっていうの？ 大事に、大事に…… 両親に育てられたあんたに……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000075>What would you know about it?! You, who were raised by loving parents all your life...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000079>そうよ、あなたは怖がってるわ。 でも、何がそんなに怖いっていうの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000079>Yes, you're scared of something. But what are you so frightened of?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300007a>お母さんへの憎しみが本物に変わる事？ お母さんに会いたかった自分を認める事!? それが今までの自分を否定する事になるから？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300007A>That your hatred towards your mother may have been justified? Acknowledging the fact that you wanted to meet your mother? Afraid that all of this denies who you are?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300007c>……痛い？ 私も痛いわ。 でも、この痛みが教えてくれた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300007C>Did those words hurt? Yours did too. But I've learned something from pain!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300007d>あなたが持ってる、 お母さんへの強い想い…… そして、不安を……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300007D>The intense feelings you have toward your mother... Your uncertainty...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300007f>……痛みを恐れていては、 自分が本当に欲しいものなんて 手に入らないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300007F>If you keep being afraid of pain, you'll never obtain what you truly want.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000080>……あんたなら…… 望まない身体を持つあんたなら、 わかってくれると思ったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000080>You, of all people... I thought that you, someone cursed with a body they never asked for, would have understood...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000081>……私は、こんな身体になってから、 今までよりもずっと、自分というものを 強く感じるようになった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000081>Ever since I began to inhabit this body, my own sense of self has only grown stronger.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000082>鏡を見ても、 そこにあるのは他人の姿。 でも、私は<Red>私<White>を感じるの。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000082>When I look in the mirror, the face staring back at me is that of a stranger. But that doesn't mean <Red>I'm<White> not there!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000083>私の塊みたいな何かがあって、 それが身体の真ん中に入ってて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000083>Whatever it is that makes me, me, is still deep inside me at my core.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000084>だから、どんな姿をしていても、 私は私のままなの……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000084>So I know that no matter whatever I look like, I will never stop being me...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000085><Hilda>さんが<Hilda>さんなのは、 心とか考え方が<Hilda>さんだから じゃないのかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000085>What makes you “<Hilda>” is what's on the inside, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000087>ごめんなさい、 偉そうな事言って……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000087>I'm sorry...I didn't mean to sound patronizing.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000088>……あんたって、 不思議な子ね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000088>You're a strange girl, you know that?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000089>……みんなのところに 戻りましょう。
<voice:330000b3>フォルスだ!! かなり強いヨ!!
<voice:330000b5>この国は今、ジルバ様によって 救済されようとしている。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000B5>This country is about to be saved by the good grace of Lady Zilva.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000b6>だが、おまえたちが得ようとしている 聖獣の力は、その妨げとなるのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000B6>However, it'll be quite a nuisance if you lot get your hands on more power from the Sacred Beasts!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000b7>邪魔者を消しに来た、 というわけか。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000B7>In other words, you're here to stop us.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000b8>ぬふふふ…… このみじめったらしい村は おまえらの墓場に良さそうだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000B8>Ahahaha... This miserable excuse for a village will be a fitting resting place for all of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000bc>夫を殺し……娘を…… <Hilda>を奪っておいて、 よくもそんな事を……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000BC>You killed my husband, kidnapped my daughter... How dare you forget such a thing...!
<voice:330000BD>Ah, you're the muel from back then.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000be>あんたが……父親を殺した？ 私を奪ったって……!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000BE>Did you really...kill my father? And kidnap me...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000bf>私は捨てられてたんじゃないの……？ まさか……それも……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000BF>Wasn't I abandoned...? Don't tell me...was that also a lie...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000c0>ふははは…… どうだ、傑作だったろう。 親に捨てられた憐れなハーフの物語は。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000C0>Ahahahaha! It made for a great sob story, didn't it? The tale of a poor little halfblood girl, tossed aside by her heartless parents!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000c1>それとも、俺が本当の 父親だったとでもした方が 劇的で面白かったか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000C1>Maybe I should've added more drama to the plot by pretending to be your real father!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000c3>見ろ、ガジュマの身でありながら、 ヒューマの男の子供など産むから、 その娘はろくでもない女になった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000C3>Look at what you've created! The spawn of a Gajuma mother and a Huma father turned out to be such a worthless woman.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000c4>娘を侮辱する事は許さない!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000C4>I will not allow you to insult my daughter any further!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000c5>ふん、許さなかったらどうする？ 無力なおまえには、 大事な娘すら守れまい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000C5>And just what are you going to do about it? You think a weakling like yourself is going to be able to protect your precious little girl?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000c9>これで……いいの…… よかった……よかった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000C9>It's...it's better this way... Thank goodness...you're safe...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000cc>あなたのタロット…… 破っちゃったから…… 私のじゃ……イヤかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000CC>I destroyed your tarot cards, so... You may not want them, but...please, take mine...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000cf>出て行けなんて言って、ごめんね…… 今まで苦しめて……ごめんね……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000CF>I'm sorry for treating you so harshly before... I'm so sorry that you've had to suffer... for so long...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000d3>バカな女だ。 ……いや、バカな夫婦だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000D3>Stupid woman. Well, not that her husband was any better.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000d4>二人して娘をかばって 命を捨てるとはな……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000D4>If they hadn't tried to shield their daughter from my attack, maybe they'd both be alive right now.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000d5>じゃあ、お父さんも 私のために……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000D5>So...my father also sacrificed himself for my sake?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000d7>自分を捨てたと思って 憎んできた親が、本当は おまえを……ぬあッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000D7>How does it feel to know that the parents you thought abandoned you, the parents you grew to hate, were actually--uwaah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000d8>な、なんだ今のは……!? 攻撃が見えなかったぞ……!!
<voice:330000db>許さない…… あんたは絶対に許さない!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000DB>You'll pay for this... You will pay dearly for this!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Hilda>を含む パーティ編成にしてください。
<voice:330000dd>このトーマが…… おまえらごときに…… やられて……たまるかぁっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000DD>Like hell I'm gonna be... beaten by the likes of you freaks...!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000de>……あんたは絶対に許さないって…… 言ったでしょうッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000DE>I said I would make you pay, didn't I? ...Didn't I?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000e0>や……やめろぉ、やめてくれ!! た、助けてくれぇぇ……
<voice:330000e4>……さっさと起きなさいよ。 目を開けてこっちを見なさいよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000E4>...Wake up this instant. Open your eyes and look at me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000e6>冗談じゃない…… 冗談じゃないわよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000E6>I'm not joking... I said open your eyes!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000e7>聞きたい事があるのに…… あんたに言いたい事があるのに…… なんで死ぬのよ!! 勝手すぎるわよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000E7>I have so many things to ask you... So many things I want to tell you... How dare you die on me! How dare you be so selfish!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000e8>どうして私を生んだの……？ 私は何のために生まれたの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000E8>Why am I the one who gets to live...? Why was I even born...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:330000e9>答えて……母親でしょう!! お願い……答えて……答えてよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:330000E9>Guide me... Isn't that what a parent does?! Please...answer me...answer me!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300010a>ナイラさんの荷物を 整理してたら出て来たの。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300010A>I gathered up Nayla's belongings and brought them here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300010b>彼女が大切にしていた水晶、 手紙と一緒に持って行って あげて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300010B>Take the letter, along with this crystal that your mother treasured dearly.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300010d>それは、あなたが赤ちゃんの頃、 あなたのために手に入れたものだって、 お母さんが言ってたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300010D>That crystal was something your mother acquired for your sake when you were still just a baby.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3300010f>詳しい事はわからないけど、 アルヴァン山脈のふもとにある島で、 あなたの長生きをお祈りしたって……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3300010F>I don't know the details, but apparently she went to pray for your longevity at an island at the foot of the Alvan Mountains.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000110>そのお祈りをするために、 この水晶が必要だったとか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000110>In order to do that, she needed that crystal or something.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000111>……もしかしたら、 その水晶って、聖獣探しの 手がかりになるかも……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000111>Hey, that crystal may be the key we need to finding the next Sacred Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000112>……色々とありがとう…… いつか、必ず戻って来ます。 お元気で……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000112>Thank you for everything. I promise, I will return here someday. Take care of yourself until then...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000114>アルヴァン山脈のふもとの島と 言っていたな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:33000114>She mentioned an island at the foot of the Alvan Mountains, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:33000115>ええ…… そこへ向かうわよ。
申し訳ありません。 馬車は運休となっております。
Entry.EnglishText: We're truly sorry, but Carriages are not available for use at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>お金が足りないようですね。 馬車のご利用料金は <nmb:012c>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>You seem to be short of money. The fee for using the carriage is <nmb:012c> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>馬車をご利用になりますか？ 料金は定額で<nmb:012c>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>Would you like to use a carriage? The fare is a flat rate of <nmb:012c> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140><font:80000002>馬車を利用しますか？ はい いいえ
<speed:00><scale:0140><font:80000002>馬車で<Unk18:48f00428b80488>に移動します。 料金<nmb:012c>ガルド はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>To travel to <Unk18:48f00428b80488> by Carriage, it'll be <nmb:012c> Gald. Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
